entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0194.10621] us-gaap:StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest has a value of -61,304,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value when used with the common stock [Member]. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : USD Rule Element Id:10621 Rule version: 26.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1862068/000182912623003671/rubicontech_10q.htm 5047

property.name: label
property.value: Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0194.10621] us-gaap:StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest has a value of -86,065,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value when used with the common stock [Member]. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest fact are: Period :2022-03-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : USD Rule Element Id:10621 Rule version: 26.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1862068/000182912623003671/rubicontech_10q.htm 5347
